price: Tàbí nígbà tí ó bá rí Iná kí ó má baà wí pé: “Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé ìpadàsáyé wà fún mi ni, èmi ìbá sì wà nínú àwọn olùṣe-rere.”
arabic: أَوۡ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى ٱلۡعَذَابَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي كَرَّةٗ فَأَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
